description.value:
These goggles feature highly reflective lenses. While wearing the goggles, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks and to saving throws against visual effects.

Activate R Interact

Trigger A creature within 60 feet targets you with a visual effect

Effect You turn your head to reflect aspects of the triggering effect back at its creator. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save as it becomes disoriented by this reflection. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). The creature is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
